title: Harry Potter and The Son of Force - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   School Life   Sci-fi   Supernatural
author: 走天家的少女
description:
Anakin Skywalker once called as Darth Vader, whose name once shook the entire galaxy is now dying. His last moments were spent repenting and finishing his work as The Chosen One.

The Jedi Order is recovering, the Rebels are reorganizing the Republic and Siths are no more.

But his only wish is too once again meet his wife, Padme.

He can feel her soul in one corner of the Galaxy. She has been reborn. And so Anakin starts a new journey. A journey to find his one true love.

But it’s not as simple as it seems. The planet he has been born on is different. Wizards secretly hide and go by their daily tasks. They use pointy sticks to control force and apparently they still haven’t mastered interplanetary travel. On the other hand the planet has Jedi Ruins, two mad dark Wizard who go by the name of Dark Lord

And he needs to go to school.

Apparently, life as Darth Vader was far more simpler.>
